**About me**

I'm a 5th year PhD student at the UMR Développement & Sociétés (IRD/ Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne) and a teaching assistant (ATER) in development economics at the Sorbonne Institute of Development Studies (Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne).

My research interests are in digital economics, with a particular focus on development economics. My thesis provides three impact evaluations of broadband internet deployment on various outcomes (political mobilization, house market, firms' choice of location...). My thesis advisors are [Mohamed Ali Marouani](https://sites.google.com/view/mohamedali-marouani/rieme-conference-paris) and [François Roubaud](https://leda.dauphine.fr/fr/membre/detail-cv/profile/francois-roubaud.html).

Thank you for visiting my website and learning more about my research interests. I look forward to sharing my findings with you in the future.



- Member of the [International Telecommunications Society](https://www.itsworld.org/)

- Member of the [AFEDEV network](https://afedev.fr/)

- Co-organizer of the [AuToMat Seminar](https://jeanbaptisteguiffard.github.io/automat.html)

- Co-organizer of the [Journée d'études sur les données spatiales](https://umr-devsoc.pantheonsorbonne.fr/actualite/journee-detudes-donnees-spatiales-nouvelles-sources-nouvelles-perspectives)
